title: It Rivaled Ancient Egypt, Then Vanished: New Study Pinpoints Why the Indus Valley Fell
description: Long drought cycles reshaped settlement choices in the Indus region. These climate stresses likely contributed to its slow collapse. A series of severe droughts, each extending for more than 85 years, was likely a major contributor to the gradual decline of the Indus Valley Civilization, according to research published in Communications Earth & Environment. These [...]

title: Hong Kong’s Ancient Tea Treasure Awakens Souls, Visit History’s Heart

title: PM Modi on Kashi Tamil Sangamam: A Confluence of Ancient Cultures
description: In his Mann Ki Baat, PM Modi lauded the Kashi Tamil Sangamam as a unique confluence of Tamil, one of the world's oldest languages, and Kashi, one of its oldest cities, highlighting its role in fostering national unity and cultural exchange.

title: Uncover the Secrets of Ancient China with a Visit to Xi’an
